long_description: Whether you're off to work, school or a day hike, the Mountain Hardwear Agama daypack carries your load with ease. It has plenty of pockets for organization and a contoured back panel for comfort. Lightweight and strong framesheet is shaped to match the curve of your back and shape of your waist so the load remains stable and well balanced; the pack won't round out. Shaped shoulder straps and fully padded back panel feature fast-wicking air mesh and strategically placed venting channels to keep you cooler. Large main compartment features a multipurpose sleeve that fits a 15 in. laptop or a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Secondary pocket features a sleeve for a tablet plus 2 zippered security pockets (1 mesh, 1 fabric). Large front pocket with stretch mesh panels and side compression straps is perfect for stashing shoes, a bike helmet, jacket or other gear. The Mountain Hardwear Agama daypack has a fleece-lined top zip pocket for quick access to sunglasses or phone. Tuck-away waistbelt; adjustable sternum strap; stretch side pockets; front and back grab handles.
short_description: Whether you're off to work, school or a day hike, the Mountain Hardwear Agama daypack carries your load with ease. It has plenty of pockets for organization and a contoured back panel for comfort.
